io.dropwizard.jersey.validation

Class HibernateValidationFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dropwizard.jersey.validation.HibernateValidationFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.core.Feature

    public class HibernateValidationFeature
extends Object
implements javax.ws.rs.core.Feature
    Register a Dropwizard configured Validator with Jersey, so that Jersey doesn't use its default, which doesn't have our configurations applied.
